name: Trashy Christmas Game #343
description:
Combining all the classic tropes of flash-style Christmas games including questionable physics, obnoxiously repetitive music and, of course, stealing mechanics from far more popular games.

Made in around 2 days and it's overall pretty dumb but enjoy nonetheless and Merry Christmas!


All assets created by me except for music which can be accessed here - https://freemusicarchive.org/genre/Christmas

Should also be a YouTube video about making this which will be linked when I finish it but anyway here's the channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG1ebn1PvyFYXi7XcfKJoDQ
